lines.text: I mean it. There's nothing going on here, ok?

[pointing at a square of butter that Louise pressed against her nipple and put on the table for Joel and Carlos to look at]
Nothing going on? What do you think that is? Graumann's Chinese tit?
Excuse me, but your boss, he invited both of us to dinner, man.
That's because he thinks we're friends.
You know, you can kiss my johnson man.
Ah, it's Monsieur Keefer and his... special friend.

[pointing to Joel]
He can kiss my johnson.
To tell you the gods honest truth, I used to use a table. But it broke. From a fat person. Weighed 300lbs at least. Table just collapsed. Killed my cat. Poor bastard.
